response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we estimate its true value to be well above $800,000. However, to facilitate a fair negotiation, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty, expert installation, and a dedicated support package to ensure a seamless integration into your existing systems. We are confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, contributing to your long-term success. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way we can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
